Detailed Description

Comment

This class is used for the gathering of comments. Every comment has a post

int $posterID This is the ID of the person that created the post string $message This is the message that the poster left SQL Date Time $postTime This is the time that the post was created Boolean $subComment This will be true if ther are subcomment and false if there are not Array of SubComment Objects $ArrayOfSubComments This is an array of subcomments which were made on a comment
